page.title: 05HERTS & ESSEX HIGH SCHOOL
page.content: The{HERTS & ESSEX HIGH SCHOOL}is celebrating its 75th anniversary this year. Our second years described life through three generations. Samantha Page's{GRANDMA}was a pupil of the school 60 years ago. My grandma, who was Kathleen Allen but is now Kathleen Palmer, went to the Herts & Essex High School about 60 years ago. School started at 9.00am and she went home for lunch. Then at 3.30pm she went home. Grandma's headmistress was called Miss Hammill. When Grandma cmae here, there was only the old block, tennis courts and a hockey pitch. When the pupils had a games lesson they had to participate if they liked it or not and if you lost your gym shoes you were fined money.
